channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Mi-moniteur, mi-Smart TV, cet écran PC LG ultra-wide (21:9) de 34 pouces animé par webOS chute sous les 300 €
item.description: Avec sa dalle ultra-large et son système webOS, l'écran PC LG Smart Monitor 34U601SA-W peut aussi bien être utilisé pour travailler que pour les moments de détente. Actuellement, Amazon le propose à 299,95 euros au lieu de 379,99 euros.

item.title: Netflix is buying Warner Bros Discovery: All of the latest updates
item.description: After a bidding war that reportedly also involved Paramount, Comcast, Amazon, and Apple, on December 5th, Netflix struck a deal to buy Warner Bros. for $82.7 billion, buying the studio, HBO / HBO Max, Warner Games, and more. There are already questions and comments coming from politicians and regulators about the proposed acquisition, and you […]

item.title: La France abat 5 drones au-dessus d’une base nucléaire ultra-sensible
item.description: Un essaim de drones non identifiés a survolé la base nucléaire de l’Île Longue, près de Brest. La Marine a promptement réagi en abattant les cinq engins. Une enquête a été ouverte.

item.title: Was 2025 Marvel’s Comeback Year?
item.description: With 'Thunderbolts,' 'Daredevil,' and more spread throughout 2025, Marvel sure had a bigger year than before. But was it a better one?

item.title: Wired Earbuds Are Making Phone Dongles a Good Thing
item.description: If you're an audiophile, dongles might be your new best friend.

item.title: OpenAI’s GPT-5.2 ‘code red’ response to Google is coming next week
item.description: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman declared a "code red" situation earlier this week, pushing staff to respond quickly to increased competition from Google and Anthropic. Sources familiar with OpenAI's plans tell me that the company is planning its first response to Gemini 3 with its upcoming GPT-5.2 update. I understand GPT-5.2 is ready to be released, […]

item.title: New streaming channel launches to give viewers a peek into city council meetings
item.description: Hamlet TV is a way to help keep citizens informed of what's happening inside local governments.

item.title: Eternity's director says it 'doesn't matter' if you disagree with the new A24 film's ending, but I still can't stand it
item.description: New A24 movie Eternity is the ultimate afterlife love triangle – but if you don’t agree with the ending, it ‘doesn’t matter’ to the director.

item.title: US security agency urges Android and iPhone users to stop using personal VPNs
item.description: CISA warned that many commercial VPNs could be putting your data at greater risk. But that doesn't mean you should give up on privacy – here's what you need to know.

item.title: Chat Control: EU Commissioner backs Parliament line on targeted monitoring
item.description: As the trialogue negotiations are set to begin on Tuesday, December 9, the debate on the controversial Child Sexual Abuse Regulation (CSAR) flares up.

item.title: Discord just dropped its first personalized year-in-review—and it looks a lot like Spotify Wrapped
item.description: The long-requested feature shows your messages, emojis, voice minutes, top servers, and one of 10 personality-style Checkpoint cards. The year is quickly coming to an end, and that means tech platforms are tripping over themselves to roll out their year-end recaps—all hoping to capture the virality that Spotify’s Wrapped year-in-review recap commands each year....

item.title: I thought I was tired. Turns out, I was burnt out
item.description: When your brain is cooked not even a vacation will get you right. Being tired is practically a personality trait in corporate America — especially in 2025. Everybody is exhausted, it seems. Folks are doing fiftyleven jobs. You’re always juggling tasks, always late for the next meeting because the last one ran long. But when you’re one of the few Black employees at the gig, there’s a subconscious fear of looking like you’re in over your head, especially with the looming fear of layoffs. So you push through, even when you’re running on fumes. You go harder, telling yourself you’ll rest once you ...

item.title: Wikipedia is getting in on the yearly wrapped game
item.description: Everyone is doing it, so why not Wikipedia? Everyone’s favorite free online encyclopedia has decided to launch its own customized Year in Review feature on its mobile app. Of course, you’ll need the app installed and have been using it for the feature to be of much use. But clearly, the Wikimedia Foundation hopes this […]

item.title: The PS5 Could Receive a Massive AI Upgrade for Games
item.description: And it’s making us even more excited for the rumored PlayStation 6 handheld.

item.title: Amazon has a huge holiday sale with Black Friday prices – AirPods, coffee makers, PS5 and more
item.description: Amazon has a huge holiday sale with leftover Black Friday prices, and I'm rounding up the 31 best deals featuring AirPods, coffee makers, PS5, and more.

item.title: The best Christmas gifts we love under $50
item.description: One of the easiest things to do during the holidays is spend too much money. It happens to many of us, even when we swear that things are going to be different this year. We want to help you stay true to your intentions to save money when possible, and we're doing that with a […]

item.title: The insurance coverage squeeze is reshaping healthcare
item.description: A new era of out-of-pocket decision making is poised to reshape how and where Americans seek care. Every year, open enrollment forces Americans to confront a familiar dilemma: Pay more for coverage that delivers less, or gamble on going without it. This year, that choice has become even starker.

item.title: Hubble observe le visiteur interstellaire 3I/Atlas en pleine transformation
item.description: Scrutée par tous les télescopes du monde depuis sa découverte il y a à peine six mois, la comète 3I/Atlas passe désormais sous le viseur de deux engins spatiaux particulièrement perfectionnés, de quoi multiplier les données sur ce mystérieux visiteur venu d'un autre système solaire.

item.title: Tesla casse les prix en France : pourquoi la Model 3 Standard assomme la concurrence
item.description: En affichant sa Model 3 Standard à 36 990 euros, Tesla ne se contente pas de baisser ses prix : la marque rebat totalement les cartes. Comment les Renault Mégane E-Tech, MG4 ou Peugeot e-308 peuvent-elles lutter face à une berline familiale vendue au prix d'une citadine ? Analyse d'un hold-up annoncé.

item.title: Google Wallet va simplifier la gestion de vos vols (en avion hein)
item.description: Google déploie une fonctionnalité pour son portefeuille numérique permettant de recevoir des notifications de proximité. Pratique pour ne pas manquer son vol.

item.title: ‘We Are Doing Harm’: RFK Jr.’s ACIP Guts Universal Hep B Vaccination at Birth
item.description: Outside experts and groups widely condemned the decision.

item.title: Wi-Fi 6 et 6E : les meilleurs routeurs et cartes PC disponibles
item.description: Le Wi-Fi 6 (802.11ax) est désormais la norme sur la plupart des produits. Du routeur au téléphone en passant par votre PC, petit tour du propriétaire des meilleurs routeurs Wi-Fi 6 et des cartes PC compatibles.

item.title: This RTX 5070 gaming laptop is on sale for an incredible price of $1,099 at Walmart - but not for long
item.description: Walmart's deals this week include a great Cyber Monday holdover in the form of this massive $400 price cut on the Asus TUF gaming laptop.

item.title: Ce nouveau malware Android invisible contrôle votre smartphone pour vider votre compte bancaire
item.description: Des chercheurs en cybersécurité ont découvert un malware particulièrement vicieux ciblant les smartphones Android. Il en prend le contrôle pour effectuer diverses opérations malveillantes en toute discrétion.

item.title: You don’t need Sam Altman or his big, beautiful LLM
item.description: Just like we did with the early internet, we’re again missing out on the promise and power of local, decentralized technology. We’ve been here before.

item.title: Prix mini, utilité maxi : 8 gadgets tech à saisir sur Amazon Haul à moins de 10 € [Sponso]
item.description: Méconnus mais très pratiques, voici 8 gadgets tech à moins de 10 euros sur Amazon Haul qui gagnent vraiment à être testés.

item.title: #FrandroidOffreMoi un smartphone Oppo Reno 14
item.description: Jour 5 du calendrier de l'Avent #FrandroidOffreMoi. Participez à notre concours pour remporter un Oppo Reno 14.

item.title: La fiabilité des batteries électriques de BYD pourrait s’améliorer grâce à cette annonce ambitieuse
item.description: BYD intensifie ses standards de production alors que sa fabrication de batteries atteint des sommets historiques. L'objectif ? Ne plus avoir aucun défaut sur les batteries que l'entreprise produit, aussi bien pour les voitures électriques que pour les autres domaines d'application.

item.title: Proton lance Sheets, un tableur sécurisé pour rivaliser avec Excel et Google Sheets
item.description: Proton renforce son arsenal bureautique : après le traitement de texte Docs, le spécialiste suisse de la confidentialité vient de lancer Sheets, un tableur qui veut concurrencer Excel et Google Sheets avec de sérieux arguments à faire valoir.

item.title: The New York Times is suing Perplexity for copyright infringement
item.description: The New York Times filed a copyright lawsuit against Perplexity, joining other publishers using legal action as leverage to force AI companies into licensing deals that compensate content creators.

item.title: Ce chargeur Ugreen 65 W 3‑en‑1, parfait pour voyager, perd 39% de son prix sur Amazon
item.description: Avec ses trois ports et sa charge d'une puissance maximale de 65 W, ce chargeur Ugreen pourra charger tous vos appareils en un rien de temps. Bonne nouvelle, il est disponible chez Amazon pour seulement 18,99 euros au lieu de 30,99 euros.

item.title: I had a big audio transcription problem – Gemini solved it, and ChatGPT didn’t
item.description: When I needed a transcription with speakers identified, Gemini 3 Pro proved its mettle.

item.title: Netflix Says It Will Keep Warner Bros. Movies in Theaters—Just Maybe Not For as Long
item.description: Netflix co-CEO Ted Sarandos assures press and investors it will honor Warner Bros.' prior theatrical release agreements but to expect that to 'evolve' to be more 'consumer friendly.'

item.title: Here’s What You Should Know About Launching an AI Startup
item.description: AI startups say the promise of turning dazzling models into useful products is harder than anyone expected. Three founders discuss what it takes.

item.title: The Apple AirPods 4 with ANC are at their lowest price
item.description: The Apple AirPods 4 with active noise cancellation are now at their lowest price of $99 ($80 off) at Amazon and Walmart. The AirPods 4 offer upgraded sound quality, wireless charging, and a built-in speaker in the case that rings if you can’t find it. The ANC, while not the best on the market, is […]

item.title: ChatGPT will decide what Americans buy this holiday
item.description: Most brands won’t make the cut without trust, relevance, and extractability. The way consumers search is changing faster than the industry expected. This holiday season, many shoppers are looking for gifts inside AI platforms, rather than retailer sites or traditional search. They are asking natural questions like:

item.title: The 38 best gift ideas for mom this holiday season
item.description: Your mom deserves the best, and we're going to help you get them something special. The right gift can make family or friend time more valuable, after all, or it can greatly enrich time spent alone. If your mom says that she has all that she needs, don't take her word for it and show […]

item.title: The New York Times sues Perplexity for producing ‘verbatim’ copies of its work
item.description: The New York Times has escalated its legal battle against the AI startup Perplexity, as it’s now suing the AI “answer engine” for allegedly producing and profiting from responses that are “verbatim or substantially similar copies” of the publication’s work. The lawsuit, filed in a New York federal court on Friday, claims Perplexity “unlawfully crawls, […]...

item.title: European Union slams Elon Musk’s X with a $140 million fine. Here’s why
item.description: EU watchdogs fined X for breaching the Digital Services Act. European Union regulators on Friday fined Elon Musk’s social media platform X 120 million euros ($140 million) for breaches of the bloc’s digital regulations that they said could leave users exposed to scams and manipulation.The European Commission issued its decision following an investigation it opened two years ago into X under the 27-nation bloc’s Digital Services Act, also known as the DSA.It’s the first time that the EU has issued a so-called non-compliance decision since rolling out the DSA. The sweeping rulebook requires plat...

item.title: Apple perd de nouveau deux cadres dirigeants : une nouvelle ère arrive
item.description: Apple est en pleine transformation. Deux nouveaux cadres sont sur le départ. En quelques jours, quatre membres de la direction ont quitté Apple pour des raisons différentes.

item.title: Get your game on with the Razer Kraken Kitty V3 X headset for just $35 at Woot
item.description: As of Dec. 5, get the Razer Kraken Kitty V3 X headset for just $35 at Woot.

item.title: Elon Musk says Tesla drivers can text while driving, but they absolutely should not
item.description: I can’t believe I have to say this, but Tesla drivers should not start texting while driving, despite what Elon Musk says. Do not listen to the billionaire CEO of the company that makes your car. He will not be liable if there’s a crash — you will. Musk took a break from posting racist […]

item.title: You can still buy Bose QuietComfort headphones for 49% off at Amazon
item.description: As of Dec. 5, you can get the Bose QuietComfort headphones (with ANC) for just $179, down from $349, at Amazon. That's a 49% discount.

item.title: Why CEOs who understand software development have a head start in the AI race
item.description: There is huge pressure on CEOs to empower their businesses to integrate AI successfully, but few have technical experience.

item.title: Meta signs commercial AI data agreements with publishers to offer real-time news on Meta AI
item.description: Meta is partnering with CNN, Fox News, Fox Sports, Le Monde Group, the People Inc. portfolio of media brands, The Daily Caller, The Washington Examiner, and USA Today.

item.title: Energy storage industry set aggressive goals for 2025 — and already crushed them
item.description: The battery storage industry in the U.S. has grown in leaps and bounds in recent years, surpassing its most aggressive targets to become one of the largest new sources of power on the grid.

item.title: The ISS Is Out of Parking Spots for the First Time Ever. Here’s Why
item.description: All eight docking ports at the ISS are occupied. That's never happened before.

item.title: Logitech CEO says AI devices are just "solutions looking for a problem"
item.description: Is AI-powered hardware pointless or have we not yet built a proper one?

item.title: Avec Warner Bros, Netflix s’empare aussi des jeux Mortal Kombat, Batman Arkham, Hogwarts Legacy…
item.description: Netflix s'empare donc de Warner Bros Discovery, pour une somme qui dépasse les 82 milliards de dollars. Une acquisition colossale qui redessine le paysage du divertissement… mais aussi du jeu vidéo, car la plateforme de streaming glisse aussi dans sa besace plusieurs studios WB — dont les créateurs de Mortal Kombat et de la saga Batman: Arkham.
